word_mean: 周期性的：以规则的间隔时间反复的

sentence.Network_en: There may be periodic police "sweeps" of crime in the area.
sentence.Network_cn: 警方可能对该地区的犯罪活动进行定时的“扫荡”。

sentence.Network_en: Periodic checks are carried out on the equipment.
Long long ago, we knew the periodic motion of a planet.
sentence.Network_cn: 很久以前, 我们就知道行星的周期运动.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from French périodique, or via Latin from Greek periodikos 'coming round at intervals', from periodos (see period)

entry.tran: 间发性的；定期的；周期的
entry.def: Periodic events or situations happen occasionally, at fairly regular intervals.

example.ex: Periodic checks are taken to ensure that high standards are maintained.
example.tran: 定期检查以确保维持高水准。

means.word_mean: 1. happening or recurring at regular intervals
3. recurring or reappearing from time to time;

auth_sentence.content: The bank makes periodic payments to the CDS seller.

auth_sentence.content: Lemming populations also undergo periodic boom and bust cycles.
